mapper.select: SELECT b.board_no, b.board_file_no, b.board_title, b.board_content, b.board_reg_date, b.board_view_cnt, b.board_user_no, u.user_nickname FROM board b JOIN user u ON b.board_user_no = u.user_no WHERE b.board_no = #{no};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community_board (board_file_no, board_title, board_content, board_user_no) VALUES (#{boardFileNo}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardUserNo})
INSERT INTO files (file_path, file_name, file_system_name, board_no) VALUES (#{filePath}, #{oriName}, #{systemName}, #{no})
